example.eg: Karen gave negative answers to all the questions.
example.egtrans: 凯伦对所有问题都给出了否定的回答。

example.eg: John's attitude is so negative, it affects his co-workers.
example.egtrans: 约翰消极的态度甚至都影响到了他的同事们。

example.eg: Attach the black wire to the negative pole.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 阴极的，负极的，负电性的

dsense.name: negative
dsense.guideword: (result: showing absence of [sth]) (医学检查、结果)

example.eg: The patient's blood was tested for HIV, and the results were negative.
example.egtrans: 病人的血样通过HIV病毒测试，结果为阴性。

example.eg: What are the negatives if we choose plan B?
example.egtrans: 如果我们选择B计划，会有什么缺点？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 负面因素, 负面特征, 消极的特征, 缺点

example.eg: I use a film camera, and scan my negatives into the computer.
example.egtrans: 我用的是胶片相机，然后扫描底片存入电脑里。

example.eg: My English teacher told me I was wrong to use a double negative.

dsense.name: gram-negative
dsense.guideword: (bacteria: having a certain cell wall) (细菌)

example.eg: Fiona was visibly upset when they responded to her request in the negative.
"No", "never" and "none" are negative answers to a question.
Michael went into the exam with a negative attitude and, unsurprisingly, did not do well.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 负面情绪, 否定态度

example.eg: The author received a lot of negative feedback about his new book.
Negative reinforcement is the removal of a stimulus that is likely to increase the probability of a behaviour.
He was hopeful that they could still have a picnic, but the clouds forming overhead were a negative sign.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不好的前兆, 负面征兆
从消极方面, 消极地
指出缺点, 找出不足

example.eg: When asked if she would work overtime, the nurse replied in the negative.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 拒绝, 给出了否定的答复

example.eg: When asked if he had murdered the old lady, the defendant replied in the negative.
